collectible.title: X-Transceiver
collectible.subtitle: Funky Video Wristwatch
collectible.text:
It's an X-Transceiver, Unova's hottest new mode of communication! Hilbert gifted you this as a way to keep in touch with him; He's even put his number in already!
...Unfortunately he didn't give you a charger, and the battery's dead.

collectible.title: Light Stone
collectible.subtitle: A Piece of Unovan History
collectible.text:
The legendary Light Stone, said to be where the great Dragon of Truth, Reshiram rested when it was without physical form. Even now, you can still feel a faint power radiating from within...
...Or you would, if this were the real thing and not a replica.
collectible.unlock: Trigger Hilbert's 'Serious Business' mode, then win against him as your last opponent while you're both nude.
